sentences:
Sāfī ( Sāpai ; plur .
ساپي Sāpī ) is a major branch of the greater Ghurghakhti Pashtun tribe .
The Safi tribe comprises a majority in the Pech Valley of Kunar and are present in significant numbers in Parwan Province ( Kohi Safi ) , Kapisa Province , Kabul Province , Laghman Province , Nuristan Province and the whole of Kunar Province .
A reasonable majority of those who were living on the Durand Line migrated since 1900 into the different urban and rural areas of Khyber Pakhtunkhwa , particularly Peshawar , Charsadda , Mardan , Nowshehra , Swabi .
A large number also settled in Rawalpindi , Tarnol , Lahore , Multan .
They are also present in large number in Mohmand , Bajaur Agency , Federally Administered Tribal Areas and in Zhob District , Balochistan , Pakistan .
